document_data.caption: A map showing Rogues' Way in central Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Rogues' Way
document_data.ends: The western wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Rogues' Way''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Rogues' Way was located in central Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. The street branched west from the midpoint of the [[Street of Bones]] to terminate at the wall to the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]
document_data.Notable Locations: The residence of Lord [[Hael]] was located on Rogues' Way.
